test-method.name: testUserSignup_Positive
test-method.description: Positive: Verify POST /signup creates a new user with random ID

test-method.name: testUserSignup_ExistingEmail_Negative
test-method.description: Negative: POST /signup with existing email returns 400 status

test-method.name: testUserSignup_MissingEmail_Negative
test-method.description: Negative: POST /signup with missing email returns 500 internal server error

test-method.name: testUserSignup_MissingPassword_Negative
test-method.description: Negative: POST /signup with null password returns 500

test-method.name: testUserSignup_InvalidEmailFormat_Negative
test-method.description: Negative: POST /signup with invalid email format returns 500

test-method.name: testUserLogin_Positive_Chained
test-method.description: Positive: Verify POST /login logs in the previously signed up user (Chained)

test-method.name: testUserLogin_InvalidCredentials_Negative
test-method.description: Negative: POST /login with invalid credentials returns 400 Bad request

test-method.name: testCreateBook_Positive
test-method.description: Verify POST /books creates a new book with authentication

test-method.name: testGetBookById_Positive
test-method.description: Verify GET /books/{id} retrieves the created book with authentication

test-method.name: testUpdateBookById_Positive
test-method.description: Verify PUT /books/{id} updates an existing book with authentication

test-method.name: testDeleteBookById_Positive
test-method.description: Verify DELETE /books/{id} deletes a book with authentication

test-method.name: testGetAllBooks_Positive
test-method.description: Verify GET /books/ retrieves all books with authentication

test-method.name: testCreateBook_NoAuth_Negative
test-method.description: Verify POST /books without authentication returns 401 Unauthorized

test-method.name: testGetBookById_NotFound_Negative
test-method.description: Verify GET /books/{id} with non-existent ID returns 404 Not Found

test-method.name: testDeleteBookById_NotFound_Negative
test-method.description: Verify DELETE /books/{id} with non-existent ID returns 404 Not Found

test-method.name: testApiHealthCheck
test-method.description: Verify API health check endpoint is reachable and returns 200 OK
